title: Stainless Steel Appliances, Washer & Dryer In Unit, Gated community
posting_body: ['Bradley Park Apartments', '2323 7th St SE, Puyallup , WA, 98374', 'Want more info on this unit?', 'See the link (below):', '<URL>', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 11', 'OR Text', '11', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text our team directly.', 'Welcome Home to Bradley Park Apartments', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 676 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Bradley Park Apartment Homes located in Puyallup, Washington is a pet-friendly, gated community of spacious apartment homes each with its own garage.', 'Located within walking distance to Bradley Lake Park and Wildwood Park, you can enjoy lush landscaping and picturesque views from your private patio.', 'We proudly offer newly renovated apartment homes featuring stainless steel appliances, chefs kitchens, new flooring, and new finishes throughout.', 'We invite you to stop by and experience the luxury that you deserve.', 'Stay active in our 24-hr fitness center; relax by our seasonal outdoor heated pool and outdoor year-round spa.', 'Walk your pets over to our gated Pet Park.', 'Our apartments are conveniently close to Hwy 512, Pierce Transit Bus Lines, the Sounder Commuter Train, Good Samaritan Hospital, Washington Fair Grounds and Joint Base Lewis McChord.', 'Shopping at the South Hill Mall is just minutes away.', 'And now you can breathe easy because we have made the move to smoke-free living at Bradley Park.', 'Come visit us and find out why our residents love Bradley Park Apartments.', 'Features', '- Ceiling Fans', '- Microwave', '- Garbage Disposal', '- New/Renovated Interior*', '- Patio', '- Stainless Steel Appliances', '- Balcony', '- Oversized Closets', '- Deck', '- Refrigerator', '- Cable Ready', '- Wireless Internet Access', '- High Speed Internet Access', '- Vaulted Ceilings', '- Hardwood Flooring', '- Dishwasher', '- Washer & Dryer', 'In Unit', '- Fireplace', '- Garage Parking', '*Select Units', 'Community Amenities', '- Pet Friendly', '- Smoke Free', '- Swimming Pool', '- Clubhouse', '- Gated community', '- Gathering Area', '- Hot Tub', '- BBQ/Picnic Area', '- Fitness Center', '- Dog Park', '- Controlled access', '- Recycling', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday:9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday:10:00AM-5:00PM', 'We do not accept Comprehensive Reusable Tenant Screening Reports as defined by and pursuant to RCW 59.18.', 'NuMQ85TC']
